project_descr: Progress for Reform of Governance, Rights & Empowerment for Sustained Stability - Democratic Governance and civil society institutions and processes strengthened to undertake peaceful resolution of disputes,

outputs.output_descr: Master and sustain a consultative process to deliver comprehensive and participatory reforms by GoL, political parties, and other stakeholders/to ensure the effective participation of citizens

Support to Governance Institutions and Promotion of Human Rights
Component Three will focus on supporting key institutions of governance and the promotion, protection and monitoring of human rights will be the focus of Output 4.

enhance youth empowerment and participation through UN-wide youth-targeted programming around priority areas of the Sustainable Development Goals and through youth mobilization, sensitization and education on the country’s reform agenda
